This is cool.
TS-Pattern is faster than most people think, and it's unlikely for code branching to be the perf bottleneck of your app, but compiling its runtime away is an interesting idea for perf critical code. Thank you for exploring this path @aidenybai & @zack_overflow! https://t.co/tE2siiUB9K

— Gabriel Vergnaud (@GabrielVergnaud) October 1, 2023

Voidpet is half game, half mental health app

We picked the health & fitness category thinking it would be less competitive/easier to rank

This turned out to be true on Android and false on iOS
